main-page.title: Transform your photos with ease professional photo editing
main-page.hero-description: Quick tools for background removal, object editing, and format conversion—all in one platform

tools-grid.pdf-description: Easily convert and manipulate PDF documents, including merging, splitting, and compressing files.
tools-grid.image-description: Edit images with tools for resizing, cropping, and enhancing quality for perfect results.
tools-grid.video-description: Process and edit videos seamlessly with features like trimming, merging, and converting formats.
tools-grid.ai-description: Utilize advanced AI algorithms for automated editing tasks, including background removal and object recognition.
tools-grid.file-description: Manage and convert various file types easily, ensuring compatibility and ease of access.

statistics.title: Statistics
statistics.description: Our platform is designed to simplify and enhance your editing experience, no matter what your needs are. With a wide range of powerful tools and a strong user base, we've established ourselves as a go-to solution for millions of users globally
